amendment.description: To require a report on the Department of Defense response to the findings and recommendations of the Defense Science Board Task Force on High Performance Microchip Supply.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2446 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2446 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lieberman. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12505) To require a report on the Department of Defense response to the findings and recommendations of the Defense Science Board Task Force on High Performance Microchip Supply.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2446 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2446 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lieberman.
